bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Order
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: IIN THE SUPERIOR COURT OF THE UNITED STATE OF WASHINGTON KING COUNTY
H.W.Fuson Plaitiff, vs. Gladys Fuson Defendant,} No.118393 ORDER

In open Court this 20th day of COtober 1916 the above entitled matter coming on for argument and hearing on the application of the Defendant for an order to show cause heretofore issued here in for an allowance to the defendant for suit money and alimony pendete lite in this action, Defendant appearing by P.H>Wilson her Attorney and the Defendant H.W.Fuson appearing in person and also by his attorney T.R.Horner, the Court having considered the matter and being duly advised, having heard the argument of Counsel and the statement of the Paintiff,

IT IS THERFORE ORDERED BY THE COURT, that the Plaintiff H.H.Fuson immediatly pay into Court or the registy thereof the sum of Four Dollars as suit money for expendses alreadt incurred and also the further sum of Twelve & 50/100 Dollars as alimony pendent lite, and also the sum of Twelve & 50/100 Dollars upon his nect paydaytouit Oct 25" 1916 and the further sum of Twelve Dollars & 50/100 semi montly thereafter, during the pendendency of this action as and for the support of the Defendant during the pendedcy of said action.
In the Superior Court of the State of Washington for the Couty of KIng
State of Washington County of King}ss
HW Fuson Plaintiff vs. Gladys Fuson dDefendant} No.118393

I, W. K. SICKELS, County Clerk of King County, and ex-officio clerk of the Superior Court of the State of Washington for the County of King do hereby certify that I have compared the foregoing copy with the original Order in the above entitled cause as the sae appears on file in my office and the same is true and perfect trascript of said original and of the whole therof.
Witness my hand and the seal of the said Superior COurt, at my office in Seattle,this 24 day of Oct 1916
IN THE SUPERIOR COURT of the State of Washington For the County of King
PHWilson Attorney for Deft Seattle, Washington
